contents.text:
You have proven to possess the power
of a true hero.
In the name of the Goddess Hylia...

I applaud you for having the fortitude
to come here. I have nothing more
to offer you.

However, there is one thing I can do to
help a hero such as yourself reach
new heights...
You may challenge me once more.

You have returned. Your heart is truly
that of a hero.
